site_name: Land east of Kellaway Road and south of 188-202 Holburne Rd, Kidbrooke, SE3 8JG
description: An application submitted under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 for a minor material amendment in connection with the planning permission Ref. 18/4041/F dated 07/08/2019 for Construction of a 2 Form Entry primary school; works include construction of new part 1/part 2 storey building with to provide classrooms, nursery, special educational needs facility, internal multi use sports hall, and administration offices; External spaces including play areas, landscaping, community use Multi-Use Games Area including floodlights, with changing facilities and amenities, separate vehicle and pedestrian access points, 69 cycle parking spaces and 16 car parking spaces including disabled parking for the variation of Condition 2 to replace the relevant approved drawings with revised drawings to allow : the construction of a new substation with associated access gates onto Kellaway Road; minor alterations to the hard and soft landscaping; increased fence height at the boundaries of the site; minor amendments to the proposed materials; anda revised lighting strategy.
